items.title: ICICI Lombard Q2 net profit rises 18%
items.description: ICICI Lombard General Insurance saw an 18% net profit increase in Q2 FY26 despite a 1.9% dip in gross direct premium income. The insurer's combined ratio edged up to 105.1%, with a dividend of ₹6.5 per share declared. The company maintains a solvency ratio of 2.73x, exceeding regulatory requirements.

items.title: HDB Financial Q2 results today: Shares in consolidation mode after listing. Should you buy?
items.description: HDB Financial Services shares are in focus today. The company will announce its September-quarter results. The stock has slipped since its market debut. Investors are cautious due to sector pressures. Analysts expect loan growth and modest margin expansion. Credit costs are anticipated to rise. The company's performance and asset quality will be closely watched.
